message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that holds significant value, and I believe it could be a game-changer for your endeavors. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product at this time, I assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm confident you'll see its potential as well.  I'm willing to offer it to you for $2000000. This is a limited-time offer, so please consider it carefully.  If you're not interested, I have another buyer ready to purchase it for $1500000.
